original_text:
and lays the beams of his upper chambers on their waters.
He makes the clouds his chariot
    and rides on the wings of the wind.
korean_text: 물에 자기 누각의 들보를 얹으시며 구름으로 자기 수레를 삼으시고 바람 날개로 다니시며

sentences.original_text: and lays the beams of his upper chambers on their waters.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 윗층들의 들보를 그들의 물 위에 놓습니다.

sentences.original_text: He makes the clouds his chariot
and rides on the wings of the wind.
